about_the_game:
There are three games included!

◆Gigant Mom Buster

Your favorite Marma has grown huge and is rampaging!

Hit him with poo and get your normal Marma back! There's also a naughty option!

Easy-to-use, exhilarating action!

◆LUNLUN Poop Break

Break the oncoming horde of poo with a bullet!

Refresh yourself with a special finishing move!

A fast-paced action shooting game!

◆LUNLUN Super Hero Babys DX

The great adventure of LUNLUN, the super baby, who was eaten by the gigantic “Boss Poop”!

A side-scrolling action game with easy controls that won't result in a game over!

■■Controls■■

We recommend using an Xbox controller, but you can also use a keyboard.

Decide (red): V key

Cancel (green): X key

(yellow): C key

(blue): Z key

L: A key

R: S key

Select: W key

* During the game, press the “F1” key, and you can assign inputs from [Settings] -> [Control Settings] at the top of the screen.

The "Pixel Game Maker Series" is a series of games created using the action game creation software "Pixel Game Maker MV" that can be enjoyed on the Nintendo Switch™.

content_descriptors.notes: After clearing the mini-game, there is a representation of the boss's clothes peeling off.

◆Gigant Mom Buster

name: Pixel Game Maker Series LUNLUN SUPER HERO BABIES PLUS NEWGAMES

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: WindowsR 8/8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 2.0GHz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Additional Notes: DirectX: Version 9.0
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: WindowsR 8/8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 3.0GHz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU / NVIDIA GeForce GTX750 or better
  • Additional Notes: DirectX: Version 9.0

short_description: Three games in one! Volume up! A compilation of Super Baby LUNLUN's action ! A super bargain edition!
